snippet: Careless assumptions about China have sent many Western companies, especially big multinationals, slinking back home.
abstract: Careless assumptions about China have sent many Western companies, especially big multinationals, slinking back home.
lead_paragraph: I was recently invited to a restaurant in Shanghai to meet friends who were hosting an out-of-town guest from the West. Their friend is a pundit and an investment reporter, with a heavy emphasis on his China investment strategies.

headline.main: Be Skeptical When Hiring an ‘Expert’ on China
